metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9412 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The unpack_read_samples function in frontend/get_audio.c in LAME 3.99.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and application crash) via a crafted wav file. It was discovered that LAME incorrectly handled certain audio files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or possibly other unspecified impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9412` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.100-2
libmp3lame0 - 3.100-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lame package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
